Leo Eltes

Producer & Composer

About Portfolio Contact Visuals

JRNL° - Teaser

11/06-2018

Music for JRNL's teaser about their upcoming video documentation of the two different climates, countryside and coast, around their hometown Kungsbacka. Unlike the other videos the music took an electronic approach to create momentum and tension.

Composition, production, mixing and performance by Leo Eltes.

JRNL° - Tjolöholm Vik

17/01-2018

Music for JRNL’s video about Tjolöholm Vik that they posted on their social feeds. A short and light video with a light piano that complements the aesthetics of the video. Written and produced in Logic Pro X with stock plug-ins.

Composition, production, mixing and performance by Leo Eltes.

JRNL° - Share your places

17/01-2018

Music for JRNL's video where they encourage people living in Kungsbacka to participate in the documentation of the city by pointing them to places that they should shoot. A simple and bright piano with a lot of reverb was used to empathize the breezy whiteness displyade in the video.

Composition, production, mixing and performance by Leo Eltes.
